programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E01 During the Cold War, ex-smuggler Harry Palmer is enrolled as a reluctant but talented spy; sent to Berlin, Harry embarks on a dangerous mission and his survival depends on his own wits and the interventions of Maddox.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E02 Palmer embraces his intuition, but gun-for-hire Randall is always one step ahead; a tip-off from a key witness draws Jean and Palmer closer to the truth, but their discovery only opens the door to a mystery.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E03 As they chase Randall to Beirut where he holds Dawson, Harry and Jean's relationship intensifies; suspicious Americans watch Dalby and find him in secret talks with a Russian spy; Colonel Stok offers Dalby a tempting trade.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E04 Suspecting an American hand in Dawson's abduction, Dalby challenges General Cathcart by sending Harry and Jean to the neutron bomb test; Harry follows a trail of clues into big trouble; Maddox undermines Jean's trust in her colleague.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E05 Harry is handed over to the Chinese military where he is subjected to a bewildering regime of mental torture; Dalby's love for Dr. Lavotchkin takes its toll on his better judgement.

programme.title: The Ipcress File
programme.desc: S01E06 Harry Palmer runs from the brainwashing but cannot hide from the agents of Cathcart's conspiracy; Jean discovers the origin of Maddox's conflict; Dalby learns his organization is to be axed; Harry worries about what has been planted in his mind.

programme.title: The Killer Clown: Murder on the Doorstep
programme.desc: S01E01 In 1990, Marlene is shot by a clown and detectives try to find a motive for her murder; her husband Michael becomes the prime suspect after detectives learn their marriage was on the rocks, but an anonymous tip leads investigators to another suspect.

programme.title: The Killer Clown: Murder on the Doorstep
programme.desc: S01E02 Michael's affair leads detectives to investigate his alleged mistress Sheila; a lead on the costume from a store puts Sheila firmly in the frame, but without evidence the case goes cold; then in 2017, new DNA evidence leads detectives to an arrest.

programme.title: The Killer Clown: Murder on the Doorstep
programme.desc: S01E03 After Sheila's arrest, the prosecution prepare for trial and the stakes are high; the prosecution's case centers on new DNA and fiber evidence; Sheila's defense attorney attempts to get the evidence thrown out.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E27 Look Into My Eyes: Absorb Attention At North Port High School in Florida, three students die within months of each other; as the community learns more, they discover a common thread: all three students were hynotized by their principal, Dr. George Kenney, not long before they died.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E28 Look Into My Eyes: Bypass the Critical Dr. George Kenney begins to reveal his side of the story; as details emerge about the deaths and Marcus, Wesley and Brittany's parents speak out, an investigation into Kenney's hypnosis practice begins; the North Port community grows suspicious.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E29 Look Into My Eyes: Activate the Unconscious The press catches wind of the story and it captures headlines worldwide; Dr. Kenney is asked to leave North Port High, and as the criminal trial heats up, the community is split on his culpability; a student comes forward with a new perspective.

programme.title: True Crime Story
programme.desc: S01E30 Look Into My Eyes: The Outcome Pressure mounts against the school board to take accountability; Dr. Kenney leaves North Port for what seems like the final time; the community grapples with guilt and grief; Stephen offers an intimate look into Kenney's hypnosis practice.

programme.desc: Movie (2024) Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the book's pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: The Year of the Everlasting Storm
programme.desc: Movie (2021) Seven stories from seven directors from around the world chronicle the effect of the COVID-19 pandemic.

programme.title: It: Chapter Two
programme.desc: Movie (2019) Defeated by members of the Losers' Club, the evil clown Pennywise returns 27 years later to terrorize the town of Derry, Maine. Now adults, the united Losers must conquer their deepest fears to destroy the shape-shifting Pennywise once and for all.

programme.title: Standing on the Shoulders of Kitties: The Bubbles and the S...rockers Story
programme.desc: Movie (2024) A viral clip earns Bubbles and his band a spot on a European tour, opening for Billy Bob Thornton and the Boxmasters. With Randy as their trusty roadie, the group heads to Prague, only to find themselves kicked off the tour and busking to survive.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Movie (2024) Leaders of the world's wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realize they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: I Am Luke Perry
programme.desc: Movie (2025) Chronicles the actor's life from small-town roots to Hollywood stardom, featuring insights from family and costars.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: Movie (2024) When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Wild Goat Surf
programme.desc: Movie (2023) In a run-down Okanagan RV park during the summer of 2003, surfing-obsessed 12-year-old skater girl Goat navigates the unbridled, unstructured summer days of youth, dreaming about becoming a surfer.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: S02E08 Bush League Wanda goes power mad; Davis and Karen make a dangerous bet; Oscar recalls "the incident" that made him give up the game for good; Brent and Hank are lost in the woods.

programme.title: Corner Gas Animated
programme.desc: S02E10 Anger Games Wanda creates her dream video game; Lacey and Karen offer to help Davis release his pent-up stress; Oscar and Emma break out the crokinole board.

programme.title: Transplant

programme.title: Gem & Shaz
programme.desc: Movie (2023) Two Asian Canadian teenage girls are given one hour at the school dance by their strict immigrant parents and are determined to make the most of it.

programme.title: Fanny: The Right to Rock
programme.desc: Movie (2021) The story of a Filipina American garage band that morphed into the ferocious rock group Fanny, which almost became the female version of the Beatles.

programme.title: Valerie's Home Cooking

programme.title: Valerie's Home Cooking
programme.desc: S13E07 Deceptively Easy Valerie Bertinelli makes a lunch with a few twists for friends; the menu includes grilled lamb pita sandwiches with Mediterranean salsa and Mediterranean grilled veggie orzo salad; dessert features the classic combo of peanut butter and jelly.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen
programme.desc: S05E09 Thanksgiving Simplified Thanksgiving simplified with some of Guy's favorite chefs; Antonia Lofaso crisps cauliflower with lemony aioli; Marc Murphy makes kabocha ravioli; Michael Voltaggio saves the best leftovers for last with some pumpkin pie egg rolls.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen
programme.desc: S05E10 Small Plates, Big Flavor Traci Des Jardins serves tuna tostadas; Michael Voltaggio preps pan con tomate; Antonia Lofaso gets red-hot and bothered; Marc Murphy makes mini eggplant parmesan.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: S08E09 Nick's Special Birthday TV Dinner Molly Yeh is putting together a TV dinner-themed evening to celebrate Nick's birthday; she's making succulent bacon-wrapped meatloaves, mashed cheesy potatoes with pan gravy, spicy easy peasies and a stunning Battenberg cake for the birthday boy.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: S08E13 Souping & Sleepovers Molly Yeh makes a cozy lunch of miso ramen and then has a sleepover; for the party, Molly serves her spicy ranch snack mix, pesto pizza pillows and a show-stopping blueberry doll cake bedazzled with sprinkles.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: S26E22 Cook Like a Pro: Liquor Store Secrets Ina unlocks her liquor store secrets and easy techniques that take red wine-braised short ribs, fennel soup gratin and an awesome fresh apple spice cake; mimosas, kir and raspberry royale cocktails and mixes up a stunning champagne VSOP.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: S26E21 Cook Like a Pro: Incredible Vegetables Ina transforms ordinary vegetables into extraordinary dishes; cauliflower toasts, baked spinach and zucchini and then an eggplant steps into the limelight in wonderful spiced lamb-stuffed eggplants that are classy enough for company.

programme.title: Giada Entertains
programme.desc: S05E05 Giada's Dinner Cruise Giada De Laurentiis hosts an intimate dinner party on a boat in the marina; sunset dinner cruise is complete with twinkling lights and a romantic and elegant menu; Giada makes paccheri with porcini and pistachio, pan-seared salmon.

programme.title: Giada Entertains
programme.desc: S05E06 Weeknight Special Giada De Laurentiis surprises her daughter, Jade, in the middle of the week with a special menu that includes all her favorite comfort foods.

programme.title: Delicious Miss Brown
programme.desc: S10E12 How Does Her Garden Grow Kardea Brown throws a garden party for her girlfriends, showcasing locally grown ingredients; she prepares Creamy Leek and Steak Pasta, Low Country Style Shrimp Toasts with House Pickled Okra, Mixed Berry Crumble and White Sangria.

programme.title: Delicious Miss Brown
programme.desc: S10E10 Cookin' When You're Feelin' Lazy Kardea leans into her freezer and pantry to prepare a full, fresh, delicious and hearty meal; she makes a Salad Bar Salad, Chicken Pot Pie Stuffed Biscuit Cups, Corn Soufflé with Jalapenos and Semi-Homemade Chocolate and Caramel Shortbread Bars.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: S51E11 Flavortown Finds Guy Fieri's finding flavor, starting with a Gainesville, Fla., bagel shop serving carrot-style lox on salted rosemary; then a Baton Rouge, La., joint is chargrilling oysters, and a spot in Naples, Fla., is serving prime-time pastrami.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: S51E12 Sandwich Shenanigans Guy Fieri digs into sandwiches, starting with brisket and smoked mushroom duxelles in Dallas; a deli in Gainesville, Fla., plates a turkey-short rib mashup au jus and a Baton Rouge, La., joint puts its stamp on po' boys.

programme.title: Tournament of Champions
programme.desc: S06E03 If You Can't Take the Heat... Guy Fieri continues the Tournament of Champions VI first-round battles with four more intense one-on-one sudden death matches; in the final battle of the night, four-time finalist Jet Tila takes on qualifier winner Pyet DeSpain.

programme.title: The Escapist
programme.desc: The tension grinds in this tale of an aged convict attempting a bold escape in order to be with his ailing daughter on the outside. Frank Perry (Brian Cox) never had a problem with serving his due time, until he discovered that his daughter is very ill following a drug overdose. Now he needs to get out, but he can't do it on his own. Recruiting a gang of motley inmates to help carry out his escape plan, Frank prepares to make a break for it.

programme.title: Marlene
programme.desc: Frank is a contract killer working for a large Styrian crime syndicate. When he is given the task of abducting a girl named Marlene and delivering her to the syndicate, everything changes for Frank. He falls in love with Marlene and disobeys his superiors, who in turn take matters into their own hands and abduct Marlene themselves. Now Frank has to battle the blunt forces of the syndicate in order to save Marlene.

programme.title: The Dead Girl
programme.desc: Writer-director Karen Moncrieff assembles an impressive ensemble in this moody and affecting psychodrama, which contains five interlocking stories connected by the murder of a prostitute. The stellar cast is lead by Toni Collette, whose character stumbles upon the homicide victim. Other top-notch performances are turned in by Marcia Gay Harden, Kerry Washington and Mary Beth Hurt. Josh Brolin, Giovanni Ribisi, Rose Byrne, Mary Steenburgen, Piper Laurie, Brittany Murphy, James Franco.

programme.title: The Hoax
programme.desc: Richard Gere is a fascinating portrait in brazen panache as disgraced author and con artist Clifford Irving, who tricked the public in the early 1970s by claiming to have written an "authorized" biography of eccentric billionaire Howard Hughes. Marcia Gay Harden is excellent as Irving's misguided wife, and Alfred Molina gives a captivating performance as the author's right-hand man, who's fully aware that Irving has something up his sleeve. Directed by Lasse Hallstrom. Julie Delpy, Hope Davis.

programme.desc: Cigar-chomping demon Hellboy (Ron Perlman), the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's secret weapon against things that go bump in the night, returns to battle a supernatural prince with an ancient grudge against puny humans. Writer-director Guillermo del Toro's sequel improves on his original, showcasing wickedly elegant monsters and spectacular action sequences.

programme.title: Vandits
programme.desc: The narrative centers on the Vandits, a small amateur gang of stoner criminals, on their unlikely Christmas Eve heist. The four crooks decide to attack a bingo hall at a senior home and rob the winnings on Christmas Eve. What follows is a journey of mischief and mayhem.

programme.title: Meditation Park
programme.desc: Maria reevaluates the life that she and her husband, Bing, have built after emigrating from Hong Kong when she finds evidence that he's having an affair. She soon decides to take back control of her life from Bing by getting a job, making new friends and discovering her own dreams.

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: John Leguizamo gives a powerhouse performance in this charged crime thriller. He plays Felix, an armored-car guard who is gunned down during a robbery and is left with brain damage. After struggling to recover, Felix turns avenging vigilante and searches for the homicidal maniac (Tyrese Gibson) responsible for his injuries. Rosie Perez offers a moving turn as Felix's compassionate wife. Bobby Cannavale, Jake Muxsworthy. Directed by Brad Furman.

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: Wealthy rancher Bick Benedict and dirt-poor cowboy Jett Rink both woo Leslie Lynnton, a beautiful young woman from Maryland who is new to Texas. She marries Benedict, but she is shocked by the racial bigotry of the White Texans against the local people of Mexican descent. Rink discovers oil on a small plot of land, and while he uses his vast, new wealth to buy all the land surrounding the Benedict ranch, the Benedict's disagreement over prejudice fuels conflict that runs across generations.

After the car towed away, the family meets Alice, who gets them into an emergency shelter. While stealing food at a Russian restaurant called 'Winter Palace', Clara meets Marc, who has been given the chance to help the old eatery regain its former glory.

programme.title: NFL Football : San Francisco 49ers at Seattle Seahawks ᴸᶦᵛᵉ
programme.desc: The Seahawks (14-3) host the 49ers (12-5) in the NFC Divisional Round. Seattle secured the No. 1 seed, while the 49ers advanced after an upset win over the Eagles. Seahawks won the most recent showdown 13-3 against the 49ers to clinch the NFC West.

programme.desc: S01E03 Cosmic Scrap More than 100 million pieces of small space debris are floating around the Earth; a collision between two of these objects in low Earth orbit could be catastrophic.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: S09E08 Secret Lives of Neutrinos Neutrinos are the most mysterious particles in the universe, and they power some of the most explosive events in the cosmos; new discoveries reveal how these ghosts pass through objects undetected and why they could be the reason humans exist.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: S09E04 Aliens of the Microcosmos The hidden kingdom of microscopic alien organisms shapes the universe as much as galaxies, stars, and planets; new discoveries reveal how bacteria, viruses and other micro-organisms built life on Earth and influence humanity's future in the cosmos.

programme.title: Impossible Fixes

programme.title: Impossible Fixes
programme.desc: S01E06 Tower of Terror Technicians battle staggering heights and fierce winds to upgrade a communications tower that keeps millions connected; special access to this dangerous job site reveals what it takes to get the job done.

programme.title: Impossible Fixes
programme.desc: S01E05 Firefighting Water Bombers Maintenance crews at a remote airstrip are exposed to the elements as they keep water-bombing aircraft flying to battle forest fires; mechanics race against the clock to get transport helicopters to safely shuttle oil rig workers.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries Ever
programme.desc: The Ten Plagues: A Greek Curse? The ten plagues of Egypt are supposedly sent by God to convince Pharaoh to free the Israelites; some scientists link these events to a volcanic eruption or climate change; could these be natural occurrences or are they divine warnings?

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries Ever
programme.desc: Ancient Rome: Fall or Pushed? The Roman Empire fell in the year 476, yet questions linger; did it truly fall or does it continue as the Byzantine Empire? What caused its demise? The debate remains controversial even among modern historians.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries Ever
programme.desc: The Incas: A Sudden Fall In 1532, Spanish conquistadors encounter the advanced Inca Empire; despite their sophisticated infrastructure, the Inca falls within decades; the story of how a powerful empire is overtaken by a small group of conquistadors remains mysterious.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries Ever
programme.desc: Tutankhamun: Lifting the Curse Tutankhamun, Egypt's teenage pharaoh, leaves an enduring legacy in the 10 short years he ruled; given questions surrounding his untimely death, Tutankhamun remains one of history's enigmas.

programme.desc: S05E02 Just What the Doctor Ordered A rehabilitation facility wants a tank with a spine insert; medical practitioners desire an underwater forest fish tank for their office.
